MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH8 postcode area of Edinburgh. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:02pm to safely carry out repair work on our underground cable network on Willowbrae Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7PM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:10PM on Tuesday, 15 December 2020.
